item.title: About me
item.description: Gameplay and Graphics programmer Ever since I was young, I have been very technical and loved solving problems. I usually start with the most intuitive approach and enjoy experimenting with different methods until everything eventually falls into place. After three years of computer science courses and a year-long stint at Arlanda Airport, I found myself at The Game Assembly, where I truly discovered my passion for programming while working on what I love.
